network_overview: Clean IMS registration exchange: UE (10.235.69.1) → P-CSCF (10.235.68.66) completes in 129 ms with no retransmissions or failure responses. Capture is control-plane only; no bearer setup (GTP-U) or media (RTP) visible.

observations.finding: Single SIP REGISTER transaction, 3-way handshake (REGISTER-100-200) completed in 129 ms; 31 pkt/s burst is nominal for IMS signaling.
SCTP used on standard SIP port 5060; no INIT/INIT-ACK visible, indicating association already up.
No SIP over TLS (SIPS) or IPSec headers observed; signaling is plaintext inside operator net.

recommendations.action: Enable SIP over TLS (SIPS) on port 5061 or IPSec ESP between UE and P-CSCF to meet GSMA IR.92 security requirements.
recommendations.rationale: Prevents spoofed REGISTER/INVITE and protects subscriber identities in shared transport networks.

recommendations.action: Configure longer capture window to include subsequent INVITE/183/200 bearer setup and RTP flow for end-to-end VoLTE validation.
recommendations.rationale: Ensures DSCP marking, GTP-U tunnel creation, and media-plane QoS are correctly provisioned.

recommendations.action: Verify SCTP heartbeat and retransmission parameters on P-CSCF; observed RTT ≈ 13 ms, so rto_min should be ≤ 40 ms to avoid spurious retransmits under load.
recommendations.rationale: Reduces signaling latency and CPU load during mass-registration events (RAU/TAU).

session_analysis.signaling_health: REGISTER-100-200 completed successfully; no 401 Unauthorized or 423 Interval Too Brief, implying UE already has valid credentials and IMS AKA has run earlier.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U tunnels or RTP flows present; bearer establishment not captured.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Signaling-only snapshot; cannot correlate QCI=1 bearer setup or RTP packet loss.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE as 10.235.69.1:6606
    participant P as 10.235.68.66:5060
    Note over UE,P: SCTP association already established
    UE->>P: REGISTER sip:ims.mnc001.mcc001.3gppnetwork.org SIP/2.0
    P-->>UE: SIP/2.0 100 Trying
    P-->>UE: SIP/2.0 200 OK (Expires: 600000)
    Note over UE,P: Registration complete, ready for INVITE
